ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَيْهِ شَىْءٌ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who reject Allah's Signs will have a terrible punishment. Allah is Almighty, Exactor of Revenge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is nothing in the earth and the heavens that is hidden from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nothing in the earth and in the heavens is hidden from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Nothing in the heavens or the earth is hidden from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed nothing is hidden from Allah, neither in the earth nor in the heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, nothing is hidden from Allah, in the earth or in the heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah-- surely nothing is hidden from Him in the earth or in the heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: From God nothing whatever is hidden in heaven and earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! nothing in the earth or in the heavens is hidden from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Nothing on earth or in the heavens is hidden from God:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah aught is concealed from Him in the earth or in the
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Nothing is indeed hidden from Allah in the earth or in the sky.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From Allah, verily nothing is hidden on earth or in the heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly, nothing is hidden from Allah, in the earth or in the heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Nothing on earth or in heaven is hidden from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nothing is hidden from God, on earth or in the heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, from Allah nothing is hidden in the earth nor in the heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:5] Nothing, no existent thing, whatever is hidden in heaven and earth from God, on account of His knowledge of universals and particulars. God specifies them [heaven and earth] because sensory perception does not go beyond these.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! nothing in the earth) of the story of the delegation of Najran (or in the heavens) concerning the angels (is hidden from Allah).
